医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
尿失禁与未来残疾的较高几率相关新研究表明，如果您是 30% 至 50% 患有尿失禁的女性之一，那么这可能会变成一个更大的健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Urinary-incontinence-linked-with-higher-odds-of-future-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Urinary-incontinence-linked-with-higher-odds-of-future-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=870db52a-1282-48dd-9921-74b1f7ec19c5 Fri, 12 Jan 2024 20:48:45 -0500 Urinary incontinence associated with higher odds of future disability
欲望的生物学特征有助于解释配对键的选择性性质跳上车去见你的爱人，共进晚餐，享受大量的多巴胺——；与对糖、尼古丁和可卡因的渴望相同的激素——；可能会注入您大脑的奖励中心，激励您勇敢地面对交通，以保持这种独特的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/A-biological-signature-of-desire-helps-explain-the-selective-nature-of-pair-bonds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/A-biological-signature-of-desire-helps-explain-the-selective-nature-of-pair-bonds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=344331bf-14e9-47d3-8a31-2bbf36cc046e Fri, 12 Jan 2024 20:45:43 -0500 A biological signature of desire helps explain the selective nature of pair bonds
可饮用的注入一氧化碳的泡沫可增强癌症治疗在实验性癌症治疗的临床试验中，吸烟者是否比不吸烟者表现更好？这个有趣的问题促使爱荷华大学的研究人员及其同事开发了一种可饮用的注入一氧化碳的泡沫，该泡沫可提高小鼠和人类细胞中自噬抑制疗法的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Drinkable-carbon-monoxy-infused-foam-supercharges-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Drinkable-carbon-monoxy-infused-foam-supercharges-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b67f5825-e802-4475-965d-1ea0ecbef201 Fri, 12 Jan 2024 20:31:01 -0500 Drinkable, carbon monoxide-infused foam supercharges cancer therapy

玛丽·卢·雷顿 (Mary Lou Retton) 对健康保险的解释有些失误前奥运体操运动员玛丽·卢·雷顿上周在美国全国广播公司的“今日”节目中谈到了一种罕见的肺炎，这种肺炎几乎夺去了她的生命，并导致她住院一个月，费用昂贵。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Mary-Lou-Rettone28099s-explanation-of-health-insurance-takes-some-somersaults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Mary-Lou-Rettone28099s-explanation-of-health-insurance-takes-some-somersaults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=625f75f0-172a-4031-9142-b7fcdc181632 Fri, 12 Jan 2024 19:25:59 -0500 Mary Lou Retton’s explanation of health insurance takes some somersaults
批准从加拿大进口药品的特朗普官员担任佛罗里达州进口计划背后的公司主席只有在特朗普政府卫生与公共服务部部长亚历克斯·阿扎尔证明可以安全地将药品带过边境之后，美国食品和药物管理局才能史无前例地批准佛罗里达州从加拿大进口药品的计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Trump-official-who-OKe28099d-drugs-from-Canada-chairs-company-behind-Floridae28099s-import-plan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Trump-official-who-OKe28099d-drugs-from-Canada-chairs-company-behind-Floridae28099s-import-plan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3089ee67-9578-4651-8a71-b9f87e9c164a Fri, 12 Jan 2024 14:55:38 -0500 Trump official who OK’d drugs from Canada chairs company behind Florida’s import plan

妮基·黑利 (Nikki Haley) 担任总统后，医疗保健方面会是什么样子？共和党总统候选人尼基·哈利 (Nikki Haley) 将在 1 月 15 日爱荷华州预选会议（本选举年的首次总统提名竞赛）之后了解她的竞选活动如何与选民产生共鸣。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/What-would-a-Nikki-Haley-presidency-look-like-for-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/What-would-a-Nikki-Haley-presidency-look-like-for-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb84efb7-6f44-44b9-886a-2cfa8b540db2 Fri, 12 Jan 2024 07:11:18 -0500 What would a Nikki Haley presidency look like for health care?
